review_text: A good cookbook holder is a necessity for people who really cook as it keeps the book from falling off the counter, gives you more working space, and keeps drips and spills from soiling the pages.  I've used plate holders and even copy stands from the stationary store in the past, but this is the Real McCoy.  Very nice cookbook holder.  Good quality.  Even holds Joy of Cooking.  I'm glad I finally invested in one.
